summary: Working at a fishing resort in an idyllic location, but surrounded by various facets of human unpleasantness, a young mute woman falls in love with a man on the run from the law for committing murder.
cast: Jung Suh|Yu-seok Kim|Jae-Hyun Cho|Hang-Seon Jang|Min-seok Son|Ji-Seon Han|Jeong-sik Kang|Hye-kyeong Choi|Seon-hwa Jeon|Won Seo|Seung-heon Song|Kim Yeo-Jin
title: La isla (Seom)
